landing.about_description_1: VaxMS was created to provide a modern vaccination management solution, meeting the growing demand for health and disease prevention in Vietnam.
landing.about_description_2: VaxMS provides a modern vaccination management solution, helping to optimize the process of registration, lookup, and vaccination reminders.
